item.title: Redux Converter ( SMOF & OptionTree )
item.dc:creator: Kevin
item.description:
To make conversion from a different options framework easier, we’ve created a conversion utility. It allows you to play with Redux and convert data from other frameworks. It’s available here: http://wordpress.org/plugins/redux-converter/ Currently supported frameworks are as follows: Slightly Modified Options Framework (SMOF) Option Tree

The post Redux Converter ( SMOF & OptionTree ) appeared first on Redux Documentation.
item.content:encoded:
To make conversion from a different options framework easier, we’ve created a conversion utility. It allows you to play with Redux and convert data from other frameworks. It’s available here:

http://wordpress.org/plugins/redux-converter/

Currently supported frameworks are as follows:

  • Slightly Modified Options Framework (SMOF)
  • Option Tree

The post Redux Converter ( SMOF & OptionTree ) appeared first on Redux Documentation.
